title: Meeting Cost Calculator
description: Estimate the total cost of a meeting using attendees, hourly rate, and duration.
helper: Split the meeting time into hours and minutes to get an automatic total.

openGraph.title: Meeting Cost Calculator
openGraph.description: Quickly calculate the total cost of a meeting with attendee count, hourly rate, and duration. View the total, per-person cost, and per-hour cost at a glance.
